#summary Using OB's wiki function

= wiki =
The wiki function returns a link to a wiki page for a given function, like a help command. *NOTE* This function has yet to be implemented.

= Usage =
Private message OB the following:<br>
*wiki* _function name_

= Example =
*wiki* _wiki_<br>
Would return the following link:
{{{
http://code.google.com/p/ominous-buffer/wiki/wiki?tm=6
}}}
Which would direct you here.
